turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Kevin A. Casey.
turn.1: What happened in 2015 with Kevin A. Casey?
turn.2: In 2015, he began work with Nick "The Stick" Pratt on an album of original strum stick music.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: Casey divides his musical life between his native Nebraska, where he performs in local clubs with his friends, and Las Vegas, Nevada, where he is a welcome player in sessions with Reno Bellamy, Marilyn B, Sweets Anderson, and other local professionals.
turn.5: When did he first appear in pictures
turn.6: Kevin first appeared in pictures in the mid-seventies as an extra.
turn.7: What was his first music production?
turn.8: In the mid-1990s, he was a host and music producer for a local Lincoln, Nebraska talk show called Zero Street along with co-hosts Ron Kurtenbach, Sally Herren, and Scott Wesley.
turn.9: Did he play himself in anything?
turn.10: In 1982, he played himself in a film by California Mix entitled "The Long Run".
turn.12: He did not appear in films again until 2014, when he appeared in two short films in the compilation "Shivers Down Your Spine".
